sessions.title: Amazon SageMaker: MLOps for Startups
sessions.description: Build production ML pipelines on a startup budget. Learn how to use SageMaker Studio, Model Registry, and Pipelines to automate model training, deployment, and monitoring without a large ML team.
speakers: Dr. Anjali Sharma, AI/ML Specialist, AWS
Kevin Park, Startup Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Amazon Bedrock: Build Generative AI Applications Fast
sessions.description: Launch generative AI products using Amazon Bedrock foundation models. Explore prompt engineering, RAG architectures, fine-tuning strategies, and responsible AI practices for production applications.
speakers: Dr. Michael Chen, Generative AI Lead, AWS

sessions.title: Startup Cloud Cost Management: $0 to $1M ARR
sessions.description: Optimize AWS costs from seed to Series A. Learn tagging strategies, rightsizing techniques, Reserved Instance planning, and cost monitoring for fast-growing startups.
speakers: Lisa Thompson, Startup FinOps Advisor, AWS

sessions.title: Serverless-First Architecture for Startups
sessions.description: Build scalable products without managing servers. Explore Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, and Step Functions to create cost-effective, auto-scaling architectures perfect for early-stage companies.

sessions.title: AWS Activate: $100K in Credits and Startup Support
sessions.description: Maximize AWS Activate benefits for your startup. Learn about credits, technical support, architecture reviews, and access to AWS experts to accelerate your product development.
speakers: Jennifer Martinez, AWS Activate Program Lead
Tom Chen, Startup Account Manager, AWS

sessions.title: Vector Databases for AI: Amazon OpenSearch and Beyond
sessions.description: Build semantic search and RAG applications with vector databases. Compare OpenSearch, pgvector on RDS, and third-party solutions for embedding storage and similarity search at scale.
speakers: Dr. Sarah Okafor, Search & AI Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Real-Time ML Inference with SageMaker Endpoints
sessions.description: Deploy low-latency ML models for production. Learn endpoint auto-scaling, multi-model hosting, A/B testing strategies, and cost optimization for inference workloads.
speakers: David Liu, ML Infrastructure Specialist, AWS

sessions.title: Spot Instances and Savings Plans for AI Workloads
sessions.description: Reduce ML training costs by 70% using EC2 Spot Instances. Learn interruption handling, checkpointing strategies, and combining Spot with Savings Plans for optimal cost-performance.

sessions.title: Event-Driven Architectures with EventBridge
sessions.description: Build loosely coupled systems with Amazon EventBridge. Explore event patterns, schema registry, cross-account routing, and integration with SaaS applications for scalable event-driven apps.
speakers: Chris Anderson, Serverless Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Responsible AI: Bias Detection and Model Explainability
sessions.description: Build trustworthy AI systems with Amazon SageMaker Clarify. Learn bias detection, model explainability techniques, and governance frameworks to ensure responsible AI deployment.
speakers: Dr. Priya Gupta, AI Ethics Researcher, AWS
Marcus Williams, ML Governance Lead, AWS

sessions.title: AWS VP Keynote: AI & Machine Learning Innovation
sessions.description: Discover the latest AWS AI/ML innovations including new Bedrock models, SageMaker features, and customer success stories. Learn how startups are building transformative AI products on AWS.
speakers: Dr. Swami Sivasubramanian, VP of AI & Data, AWS
